verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> give ear <S%H238><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my supplications: <S%H8469><s%> in thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me, and in thy righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

And enter <S%H935><s%> not <S%H408><s%> into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thy servant: <S%H5650><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in thy sight <S%H6440><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> be justified. <S%H6663><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath persecuted <S%H7291><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> he hath smitten <S%H1792><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> down to the ground; <S%H776><s%> he hath made me to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in darkness, <S%H4285><s%> as those that have been long <S%H5769><s%> dead. <S%H4191><s%>
Therefore is my spirit <S%H7307><s%> overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me; my heart <S%H3820><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> me is desolate. <S%H8074><s%>

I remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> thy works; <S%H6467><s%> I muse <S%H7878><s%> on the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands. <S%H3027><s%>
I stretch forth <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> unto thee: <S%H413><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty <S%H5889><s%> land. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me speedily, <S%H4116><s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> faileth: <S%H3615><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me, lest I be like <S%H4911><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Cause me to hear <S%H8085><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in thee do I trust: <S%H982><s%> cause me to know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H2098><s%> I should walk; <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> from mine enemies: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H341><s%> I flee unto thee to hide me. <S%H3680><s%> <S%H413><s%>

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> thy will; <S%H7522><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my God: <S%H430><s%> thy spirit <S%H7307><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> me into the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness. <S%H4334><s%>

Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for thy name's sake: <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> for thy righteousness' <S%H6666><s%> sake bring my soul out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H5315><s%> of trouble. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6869><s%>

And of thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> cut off <S%H6789><s%> mine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> them that afflict <S%H6887><s%> my soul: <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am thy servant. <S%H5650><s%>
